item.lightwithin.berry.tooltip: Press §dSHIFT§r to know what this berry does!
item.lightwithin.luxmutua_berry.tooltip: §eThe ever-twisting light of this berry will
item.lightwithin.luxcognita_berry.toolti: §eThe all-knowing light of this berry will
§atell you the secrets§e of your §binner light§e!
light.description.error: Uhm... your light is... an error? Light not found, report please!
light.description.heal: Your light, yes, is a gentle and caring one indeed
light.description.defense: Resilience, that's what your light is made of
light.description.strength: You have a vigorous light, lending its powers to your blade
light.description.blazing: It is already firing up within you, ready to burst every moment
light.description.frost: Even if cold as ice, your light is ready to assist you
light.description.earthen: Your light draws its power from the earth around you!
light.description.wind: The wind is a good friend of your light!
light.description.aqua: Your light best reflects upon watery surfaces!
light.description.activation.heal.self: Your light flowed trough you, sewing your wounds!
light.description.activation.heal.allies: Your light flowed trough you and your allies, sewing your wounds!
light.description.activation.heal.other: Your light flowed trough peaceful creatures, sewing their wounds!
light.description.activation.defense.sel: Your light tensed up, shielding you from an hurtful future!
light.description.activation.defense.all: Your light tensed up, shielding your allies from an hurtful future!
light.description.activation.defense.oth: Your light tensed up, shielding peaceful creatures from an hurtful future!
light.description.activation.strength.se: Your light shone bright, strengthening your soul!
light.description.activation.strength.al: Your light shone bright, strengthening your allies!
light.description.activation.strength.ot: Your light shone bright, strengthening peaceful creatures around you!
light.description.activation.blazing.ene: Your light wants to incinerate the enemies that stand before you!
light.description.activation.blazing.all: Your light will incinerate everything that stands in your way!
light.description.activation.frost.enemi: All your enemies will be made into a statue of ice!
light.description.activation.frost.all: Everything will be frozen in ice!
light.description.activation.frost.self: Go forth ice, and protect me!
light.description.activation.frost.allie: Go forth ice, and protect us!
light.description.activation.earthen.ene: The earth shall split under the soles of the enemy!
light.description.activation.frog.damage: You are confused, so confused that you hit yourself.
light.description.activation.wind.self: The wind shall carry me onwards!
light.description.activation.aqua.enemie: Your enemy shall drown in a watery cage!
light.description.activation.aqua.all: Inhabitants of the depths, hear my call and aid me!
light.description.activation.aqua.self: Let me swiftly move on a watery carpet!
light.description.activation.aqua.allies: Let us swiftly move on a watery carpet!
